pr_title: CB-5189 disable SDX upgrade tests on AWS

timeline.message: CB-5189 disable SDX upgrade tests on AWS

timeline.bodyText: The aws-e2e-tests.yaml file is now the collection of tests that can be run on aws (i.e. someone has written all the code needed). If we delete the SdxUpgradeTests entry we will forget that the SdxUpgradeTests was working for aws. I therefore suggest to create an aws-e2e-tests-inactive.yaml file and move the name of the deleted test-file there with some comments why the test is not working and what needs to be fixed.
timeline.author: gergopapi2

replies.bodyText: But it is ok for me as well to create a follow-up jira with this content to have the tests fixed asap. I can then do the follow-up. It is up to you.
replies.author: gergopapi2

replies.bodyText:
I don't think that we should mark this in our code base, on the other hand a ticket has been created to cover the fix of the mentioned test. It is hard to be forgotten this way:
https://jira.cloudera.com/browse/CB-5189
replies.author: biharitomi

replies.bodyText: I am not sure if that is the best practice as we might not know about all the jiras that are available. For someone who just looks at the code it might not be obvious what is to be done. Nevertheless I approved the PR as a jira is way better than nothing.
replies.author: gergopapi2
